parameters.name: meshObjectCollection
parameters.description: the name of the meshObjectCollection the meshObjects should be imported into (optional)

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: If meshObjectCollection parameter is provided, this is the owner of the meshObjectCollection (optional)

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: meshObject Import is <<versioning,versioned>> and `application/vnd.meshcloud.api.meshobjects.v1+yaml` or `application/vnd.meshcloud.api.meshobjects.v1+json` can be used as a `Content-Type`.

parameters.name: workspaceIdentifier
parameters.description: Filter for Building Blocks that belong to the meshWorkspace with given identifier. (optional)

parameters.name: projectIdentifier
parameters.description: Filter for Building Blocks that belong to the meshProject with given identifier. (optional)

parameters.name: platformIdentifier
parameters.description: Filter for Building Blocks that belong to the meshPlatform with given identifier. (optional)

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Filter for Building Blocks with the given display name. (optional)

parameters.name: definitionName
parameters.description: Filter for Building Blocks that belong to the definition with the given name. (optional)

parameters.name: versionNumber
parameters.description: Filter for Building Blocks that use a certain version number. Can be the number or only 'v1', etc. (optional)

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter for Building Blocks that have a certain status. One of WAITING_FOR_DEPENDENT_INPUT, WAITING_FOR_OPERATOR_INPUT, PENDING, IN_PROGRESS, SUCCEEDED, FAILED. (optional)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number (default=0). See <<paging,Paging information>>.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The amount of elements in a single page (default={default-page-size}). See <<paging,Paging information>>.

parameters.name: workspaceIdentifier
parameters.description: Filter for meshProjects that belong to the meshWorkspace with given identifier. (optional)

parameters.name: paymentIdentifier
parameters.description: Filter for meshProjects that have the meshPaymentMethod with given identifier assigned. Substitute Payment Methods on meshProjects are not considered! Use an empty or blank value to filter for meshProjects without an assigned meshPaymentMethod. (optional)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number (default=0). See <<paging,Paging information>>.

parameters.description: Filter for meshServiceInstances that are part of the meshWorkspace with given identifier. (optional)

parameters.name: projectIdentifier
parameters.description: Requires workspaceIdentifier. Filter for meshServiceInstances that are part of the meshProject of a certain workspace with given identifier. (optional)

parameters.name: marketplaceIdentifier
parameters.description: Filter for meshServiceInstances that are part of a marketplace with given identifier. (optional)

parameters.name: serviceIdentifier
parameters.description: Filter for meshServiceInstances with given service identifier. (optional)

parameters.name: planIdentifier
parameters.description: Requires serviceIdentifier. Filter for meshServiceInstances with given service plan identifier. (optional)

parameters.name: workspaceIdentifier
parameters.description: Filter for meshTenants that belong to the meshWorkspace with given identifier. (optional)

parameters.name: projectIdentifier
parameters.description: Filter for meshTenants that belong to the meshProject with given identifier. (optional)

parameters.name: platformIdentifier
parameters.description: Filter for meshTenants that belong to the meshPlatform with given identifier. (optional)

parameters.name: deletionState
parameters.description: Filter for meshTenants with a certain deletion state. Possible values are: [ACTIVE](default option) All meshTenants that are not deleted or submitted for deletion,[MARKED_FOR_DELETION] All meshTenants that are awaiting manual deletion approval, or [DELETED] All meshTenants that are deleted or submitted for deletion

parameters.name: page

parameters.name: workspaceIdentifier
parameters.description: Filter for meshUsers assigned to the meshWorkspace with given identifier. (optional)

parameters.name: projectIdentifier
parameters.description: Requires workspaceIdentifier. Filter for meshUsers having access to the meshProject of a certain workspace with given identifier. (optional)

parameters.name: platformIdentifier
parameters.description: Filter for meshUsers having access to a meshTenant which exist on the platform with given identifier. (optional)

parameters.name: workspaceRole
parameters.description: Filter for meshUsers with given workspace role name, e.g Workspace Manager. (optional)

parameters.name: projectRole
parameters.description:
Filter for meshUsers with an active role by the given project role name. By default the following roles are used: 
Project Admin, Project User and Project Reader. (optional)

parameters.name: firstName
parameters.description: Filter for meshUsers based on their first name. (optional)

parameters.name: lastName
parameters.description: Filter for meshUsers based on their last name. (optional)

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Filter for meshUsers based on their username. (optional)

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Filter for meshUsers based on their E-mail. (optional)

parameters.name: euid
parameters.description: Filter for meshUsers based on their EUID. (optional)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number (default=0). See <<paging,Paging information>>.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The amount of elements in a single page (default={default-page-size}). See <<paging,Paging information>>.

parameters.name: customerIdentifier
parameters.description: Filter for meshUsers assigned to the meshCustomer with given identifier. (optional)

parameters.name: customerRole
parameters.description: Filter for meshUsers with given customer role name, e.g Workspace Manager. (optional)

ownedByProject.description: The project that this Service Instance belongs to.

marketplaceIdentifier.description: The identifier of the marketplace that this Service Instance belongs to.

instanceId.description: The instance id this Service Instance should use.

ownedByWorkspace.description: The workspace that this Service Instance belongs to.

metadata.description: Metadata and more fields to identify the Service Instance.

apiVersion.description: Version of Service Instance datatype. Matches the version part provided within the `Accept` request header.

kind.description: As a common meshObject structure exists, every meshObject has a 'kind'. This is always 'meshBuildingBlock' for this endpoint.

creator.description: The creator's username that creates this Service Instance

displayName.description: The display name of the Service Instance.

planId.description: The id of the plan for this Service Instance

serviceId.description: The id of the service for the Service Instance

_links.description: Contains the self link, a link to the related tenant and <<paging,pagination>> links.

_embedded.description: Contains the actual content of the paged response.

_links.description: Currently only contains the self link and <<paging,pagination>> links.

name.description: The identifier of the project the user should get assigned to.

ownedByWorkspace.description: The identifier of the workspace which contains the project.

name.description: The username of the referenced user.
The name of the referenced role for this user.
The userIdentifier as 'name' to uniquely identify the meshUser.

metadata.description: Always contains the 'name' to uniquely identify the meshUser.

apiVersion.description: Version of meshUser datatype. Matches the version part provided within the `Accept` request header.

_links.description: Available <<mesh_user_links,links>> on a meshUser.

kind.description: As a common meshObject structure exists, every meshObject has a 'kind'. This is always 'meshUser' for this endpoint.

euid.description: External User ID which is used to lookup the user in the cloud platforms.

tags.description: Key/Value pairs of tags set on the meshUser. Keep in mind, that values are an array. Also see our general section about <<tags>>

spec.description: All fields in this section describe the meshUser.

markedForDeletionOn.description: If the Building Block has been marked for deletion, the <<data_types,date>> when a user requested the deletion is provided via this field. e.g. `2020-12-22T09:37:43Z`

forcePurge.description: Set to true, if an operator explicitly requested this Building Block to be purged.

definitionVersion.description: The version number of the Building Block Definition this Building Block is based on.

markedForDeletionBy.description: If the Building Block has already been deleted, the username of the user who triggered the deletion is provided here.

createdOn.description: The Building Block has been created at this <<data_types,date>> (e.g. `2020-12-22T09:37:43Z`).

uuid.description: The UUID to uniquely identify the Building Block.

definitionUuid.description: The UUID of the Building Block Definition this Building Block is based on.

tenantIdentifier.description: The full identifier of the tenant, this Building Block is created in.

metadata.description: Always contains the 'uuid' to uniquely identify the Building Block. It also contains additional meta information like the Building Block creation date.

apiVersion.description: Version of Building Block datatype. Matches the version part provided within the `Accept` request header.

_links.description: Available <<mesh_buildingblock_links,links>> on a Building Block.

kind.description: As a common meshObject structure exists, every meshObject has a 'kind'. This is always 'meshBuildingBlock' for this endpoint.

parentBuildingBlocks.description: List of parent building blocks, which are set on the Building Block.

buildingBlockUuid.description: The UUID of the parent Building Block.

definitionUuid.description: The UUID of the Building Block Definition of the parent Building Block.

inputs.description: List of inputs, which are set on the Building Block.

valueType.description: The data type of the value. One of STRING, INTEGER, BOOLEAN, FILE, LIST, SINGLE_SELECT.

value.description: The value, which is set on this input.

key.description: The key of the input as set on the related Building Block Definition.

displayName.description: The display name of the Building Block as it is shown in meshPanel.

spec.description: All fields in this section describe the Building Block.

outputs.description: List of outputs, which are set on the Building Block.

valueType.description: The data type of the value. One of STRING, INTEGER, BOOLEAN, FILE, LIST, SINGLE_SELECT.

value.description: The value, which is set on this output.

key.description: The key of the output as set on the related Building Block Definition.

status.description: The status of the Building Block. One of WAITING_FOR_DEPENDENT_INPUT, WAITING_FOR_OPERATOR_INPUT, PENDING, IN_PROGRESS, SUCCEEDED, FAILED.
All fields in this section describe the current status of the Building Block.

ownedByProject.description: The identifier of the meshProject the meshTenant belongs to.

assignedTags.description: The tags assigned to this meshTenant originating from meshWorkspace, Payment Method and meshProject. Keep in mind, that values are an array. Also see our general section about <<tags>>

deletedOn.description: If the meshTenant has been submitted for deletion by a Workspace Manager, the <<data_types,date>>, the date is represented here (e.g. `2020-12-22T09:37:43Z)`. Otherwise this field is missing.

platformIdentifier.description: The identifier of the related platform instance

tenantIdentifier.description: The full identifier of this tenant is a unique string consisting of the workspace identifier, project identifier and platform identifier separated by '.'.

ownedByWorkspace.description: The identifier of the meshWorkspace the meshTenant belongs to.

metadata.description: Always contains the 'ownedByProject', 'ownedByWorkspace' and 'platformIdentifier' to identify the meshTenant.

apiVersion.description: Version of meshTenant datatype. Matches the version provided in the `Accept` request header.

_links.description: Currently only contains the self link.

kind.description: As a common meshObject structure exists, every meshObject has a 'kind'. This is always 'meshTenant' for this endpoint.

quotas.description: The set of applied Tenant Quotas. They can be set individually per tenant. By default the Landing Zone quotas are applied to new meshTenants.

landingZoneIdentifier.description: The identifier of the Landing Zone of this meshTenant. This field will be empty if the meshTenant has no Landing Zone.

localId.description: The localId (platform tenant id) assigned with this meshTenant. It will only be set if the tenant  was either imported via meshObject API with a localId or if at least one replication run finished successfully for this tenant.

spec.description: All fields in this section describe the meshTenant.

name.description: The workspaceUserGroupIdentifier as 'name' to uniquely identify the meshWorkspaceUserGroup.

ownedByWorkspace.description: The identifier of the workspace that owns this WorkspaceUserGroup.

metadata.description: Always contains the 'name' to uniquely identify the meshWorkspaceUserGroup. It also contains the workspace name that owns this WorkspaceUserGroup.

apiVersion.description: Version of meshWorkspaceUserGroup datatype. Matches the version part provided within the `Accept` request header.

_links.description: Available <<mesh_workspaceusergroup_links,links>> on a meshWorkspaceUserGroup.

kind.description: As a common meshObject structure exists, every meshObject has a 'kind'. This is always 'meshWorkspaceUserGroup' for this endpoint.

egid.description: External Group Identifier, this is an optional field.

displayName.description: The display name of the meshWorkspaceUserGroup as it is shown in meshPanel.

tags.description: Key/Value pairs of tags set on the meshWorkspaceUserGroup. Keep in mind, that values are an array. Also see our general section about <<tags>>

spec.description: All fields in this section describe the meshWorkspaceUserGroup.

_links.description: Currently only contains the self link and <<paging,pagination>> links.

name.description: The identifier of the project the group is assigned to.

ownedByWorkspace.description: The identifier of the workspace which contains the project.

name.description: The identifier of this user group.
The name of the referenced role for this group.

deletedOn.description: If the meshProject has been submitted for deletion by a Workspace Manager, the <<data_types,date>>, the date is represented here (e.g. `2020-12-22T09:37:43Z)`. Otherwise this field is missing.

name.description: The projectIdentifier as 'name'.

createdOn.description: The meshProject has been created at this <<data_types,date>> (e.g. `2020-12-22T09:37:43Z`).

metadata.description: Always contains the 'name' and 'ownedByWorkspace' to uniquely identify the meshProject.

apiVersion.description: Version of meshProject datatype. Matches the version part provided within the `Accept` request header.

_links.description: Available <<mesh_project_links,links>> on a meshProject.

kind.description: As a common meshObject structure exists, every meshObject has a 'kind'. This is always 'meshProject' for this endpoint.

displayName.description: The display name of the meshProject as it is shown in meshPanel.

tags.description: Key/Value pairs of tags set on the meshProject. Keep in mind, that values are an array. Also see our general section about <<tags>>

spec.description: All fields in this section describe the meshProject.

_links.description: All available <<mesh_object_links,meshObject Links>> for the authenticated user.

project-id.description: The ID of the project metadata information shall be retrieved for.

project-identifier.description: Immutable unique identifier of the project.

customer-identifier.description: Immutable unique identifier of the customer

costCenter.description: A cost center number could be a custom tag.

customNumber.description: And any further attribute can be provided as a tag.

tags.description: Custom tags specified on the project.

_links.description: All available <<mesh_object_links,meshObject Links>> for the authenticated user.

name.description: The paymentMethodIdentifier as 'name'.

metadata.description: Always contains the 'name' and (optional) 'ownedByWorkspace' to uniquely identify the meshPaymentMethod.

expirationDate.description: The expiration date <<data_types,date>> of the meshPaymentMethod.

tags.description: Key/Value pairs of tags set on the meshPaymentMethod. Keep in mind, that values are an array. Also see our general section about <<tags>>

spec.description: All fields in this section describe the meshPaymentMethod.

outputs.description: List of outputs, which are set on the Building Block. Empty, just after creation.

status.description: The status of the Building Block. One of WAITING_FOR_DEPENDENT_INPUT, WAITING_FOR_OPERATOR_INPUT, PENDING, IN_PROGRESS, SUCCEEDED, FAILED.
All fields in this section describe the current status of the Building Block.

ownedByProject.description: The project that this Service Instance belongs to.

marketplaceIdentifier.description: The identifier of the marketplace that this Service Instance belongs to.

instanceId.description: The instance id this Service Instance should use.

ownedByWorkspace.description: The workspace that this Service Instance belongs to.

metadata.description: Metadata and more fields to identify the Service Instance.

apiVersion.description: Version of Service Instance datatype. Matches the version part provided within the `Accept` request header.

kind.description: As a common meshObject structure exists, every meshObject has a 'kind'. This is always 'meshBuildingBlock' for this endpoint.

creator.description: The creator's username that creates this Service Instance

displayName.description: The display name of the Service Instance.

planId.description: The id of the plan for this Service Instance

serviceId.description: The id of the service for the Service Instance

name.description: The userIdentifier as 'name' to uniquely identify the meshUser.

metadata.description: Always contains the 'name' to uniquely identify the meshUser.

apiVersion.description: Version of meshUser datatype. Matches the version part provided within the `Accept` request header.

_links.description: Available <<mesh_user_links,links>> on a meshUser.

kind.description: As a common meshObject structure exists, every meshObject has a 'kind'. This is always 'meshUser' for this endpoint.

euid.description: External User ID which is used to lookup the user in the cloud platforms.

tags.description: Key/Value pairs of tags set on the meshUser. Keep in mind, that values are an array. Also see our general section about <<tags>>

spec.description: All fields in this section describe the meshUser.

ownedByProject.description: The identifier of the meshProject the meshTenant belongs to.

platformIdentifier.description: The identifier of the platform the meshTenant belongs to.

ownedByWorkspace.description: The identifier of the meshWorkspace the meshTenant belongs to.

metadata.description: Fixed fields that help identify the Tenant.

apiVersion.description: Version of Tenant datatype. Matches the version part provided within the `Accept` request header.

kind.description: As a common meshObject structure exists, every meshObject has a 'kind'. This is always 'meshTenant' for this endpoint.

landingZoneIdentifier.description: The identifier of the landing zone the meshTenant belongs to.

localId.description: The localId (platform tenant id) assigned with this meshTenant. If it is set, meshStack will attempt to import an existing tenant instead of creating a new one.

spec.description: All fields in this section describe the Tenant.

_links.description: All available <<index_links,Top-Level Links>> for the authenticated user.

name.description: Name of the meshObjectCollection (has to be unique)

description.description: A freetext field to help describing the contents of the meshObjectCollection

_links.description: Currently only contains the self link and <<paging,pagination>> links.

_embedded.description: Contains the actual content of the paged response.

name.description: The identifier of the project the group should get assigned to.

ownedByWorkspace.description: The identifier of the workspace which contains the project.

name.description: Name of this binding which later can be used to refer to it

_links.description: Currently only contains the self link and <<paging,pagination>> links.

name.description: The identifier of the referenced group.
The name of the referenced role for this group.

ownedByProject.description: The identifier of the meshProject the meshTenant belongs to.

assignedTags.description: The tags assigned to this meshTenant originating from meshWorkspace, Payment Method and meshProject. Keep in mind, that values are an array. Also see our general section about <<tags>>

deletedOn.description: If the meshTenant has been submitted for deletion by a Workspace Manager, the <<data_types,date>>, the date is represented here (e.g. `2020-12-22T09:37:43Z)`. Otherwise this field is missing.

platformIdentifier.description: The identifier of the related platform instance

tenantIdentifier.description: The full identifier of this tenant, a concatenation of the workspace identifier, project identifier and platform identifier.

ownedByWorkspace.description: The identifier of the meshWorkspace the meshTenant belongs to.

metadata.description: Always contains the 'ownedByProject', 'ownedByWorkspace' and 'platformIdentifier' to identify the meshTenant.

apiVersion.description: Version of meshTenant datatype. Matches the version provided in the `Accept` request header.

_links.description: Currently only contains the self link.

kind.description: As a common meshObject structure exists, every meshObject has a 'kind'. This is always 'meshTenant' for this endpoint.

quotas.description: The set of applied Tenant Quotas. They can be set individually per tenant. By default the Landing Zone quotas are applied to new meshTenants.

landingZoneIdentifier.description: The identifier of the Landing Zone of this meshTenant. This field will be empty if the meshTenant has no Landing Zone.

localId.description: The localId (platform tenant id) assigned with this meshTenant. It will only be set if the tenant  was either imported via meshObject API with a localId or if at least one replication run finished successfully for this tenant.

spec.description: All fields in this section describe the meshTenant.

_links.description: Currently only contains the self link and <<paging,pagination>> links.

deletedOn.description: If the meshWorkspace has already been deleted, the <<data_types,date>> when deletion happened is provided via this field. e.g. `2020-12-22T09:37:43Z`

name.description: The workspaceIdentifier as 'name' to uniquely identify the meshWorkspace.

createdOn.description: The meshWorkspace has been created at this <<data_types,date>> (e.g. `2020-12-22T09:37:43Z`).

metadata.description: Always contains the 'name' to uniquely identify the meshWorkspace. Can additionally contain meta information like the meshWorkspace creation date.

apiVersion.description: Version of meshWorkspace datatype. Matches the version part provided within the `Accept` request header.

_links.description: Available <<mesh_workspace_links,links>> on a meshWorkspace.

kind.description: As a common meshObject structure exists, every meshObject has a 'kind'. This is always 'meshWorkspace' for this endpoint.

displayName.description: The display name of the meshWorkspace as it is shown in meshPanel.

tags.description: Key/Value pairs of tags set on the meshWorkspace. Keep in mind, that values are an array. Also see our general section about <<tags>>

spec.description: All fields in this section describe the meshWorkspace.

Currently only contains the self link and <<paging,pagination>> links.
